title: Halifax Police investigate sudden death inside Walmart, company ‘heartbroken’
description: Halifax Regional Police are investigating a sudden death at a Walmart on Mumford Road in the city's west end. Few details have so far been provided.

title: Elon Musk offers $1M giveaway for swing state voters who sign PAC petition
description: Elon Musk is raising eyebrows - and questions about U.S. election law - with a new stunt: He's promising to give $1 million to random swing state voters who sign his new petition.

title: At least 7 dead, 6 critically injured after ferry dock collapses in Georgia
description: Officials say upwards of 40 people were on the gangway when the “catastrophic failure” occurred, and at least 20 people fell into the water.

title: Are we entering a new analogue age? Gen Z is leading us there
description: For decades, we've lived in a digital world. Now gen Z is reversing that.

title: B.C. Election: What the party leaders said as votes continue to be counted
description: The outcome of British Columbia's election remains unclear after a close race between the NDP and the B.C. Conservatives. Vote counting will continue Sunday.

title: Hurricane Oscar makes landfall in the Bahamas, heads for Cuba
description: Hurricane Oscar made landfall early Sunday in the southeastern Bahamas and was heading toward Cuba, an island recently beleaguered by a massive power outage.

title: Liberals unhappy with Trudeau ‘don’t have another choice’: ex-BQ leader
description: Gilles Duceppe said no one is running to replace Justin Trudeau as leader of the beleaguered Liberal party 'because they know they will lose'

title: Bishnoi gang has stoked fear in Canada for years, says B.C. city councillor
description: Fear of the Bishnoi gang and its leader has permeated Canada's South Asian diaspora for years, says a city councillor in Richmond, B.C.
